item.description:
Hike from the MSSF Headquarters to "Kurt's Bog", enjoy a tour of the bog led by Kurt Stottmeier, and then go a short distance to the party at Kurt and Helga Stottmeier's house. Meet at the Forest Headquarters at 12:15 to register, the hike will commence at 12:30. Children and good dogs are welcome.


Note: the starting time of this hike may change as Frank Werny is helping Sharl figure out how to actually get from the Headquarters to the bog in an hour.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet the group in the Headquarter's Parking Lot.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Hike to 'Kurt's Bog'/ Welcome-Bog-To-MSSF Party
